message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $200. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about $170?
I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $170 to me. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
